info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:51PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, north central Silver Bow and southern Powell Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 951 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Valley, or 7 miles southwest of Anaconda, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, West Valley, Warm Springs, Galen, Lost Creek, Crackerville, Opportunity and Racetrack. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 190 and 210. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
